title: Manipulations
overview: Maud is an accomplished businesswoman and a blessed mother surrounded by faithful friends. The only thing missing is a man to share her life with. Everything changes when she meets Mathias. She can't believe it but it's true: Mathias is perfect and loves her. Happy in her new life, Maud can't see what's really going on. When her son starts digging a little deeper, he quickly realizes that his mother is in love with a dangerous manipulator.
